original_text: Then Abraham breathed his last and died at a good old age, an old man and full of years; and he was gathered to his people.
korean_text: 그의 나이가 높고 늙어서 기운이 다하여 죽어 자기 열조에게로 돌아가매

sentences.original_text: and died at a good old age
an old man and full of years
and he was gathered to his people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그의 백성에게로 모이게 되었다
